title: The best 4th of July laptop deals: save on Dell, HP, Samsung and more
author: tabitha-baker
summary: All the best 4th of July laptop deals in one place
article: The 4th of July sales are now live and we've spotted some excellent 4th of July laptop deals perfect for those looking to upgrade this holiday weekend. From super cheap Chromebooks to premium machines taking big price cuts, we've brought together all the highest value laptop deals so that you can browse them all in one place.

We're seeing a strong supply of 4th of July laptop deals in the $300 - $500 range this week, with machines offering 8GB RAM and between 128GB and 256GB of SSD storage space nestled neatly in this price range. Some of the cheaper options are sacrificing a little processing power to excel in memory and storage, but you'll still find a healthy supply of i5 or equivalent options here.
You'll find all our top picks of the best 4th of July laptop sales just below, or skip straight to your budget to get to the best deals we've found so far.
We're also rounding up the best 4th of July Walmart sales as well as the latest 4th of July TV deals as well. Or, take a look at all the best cheap laptop deals we've found this week.

headers.3: The best 4th of July laptop deals: quick links
